mapper.select: SELECT movie_no, name, thumbnail, price, Floor(price / 100 * (100 - sale)) as sale,IF(type='B',"구매","대여") AS type FROM movie where movie_no IN(select movie_no from movie_category where category_type_no IN(SELECT category_type_no FROM category_type WHERE name = #{name} AND sale != 100)) ORDER BY price desc LIMIT 0,10;

SELECT movie_no, name, thumbnail, price, Floor(price / 100 * (100 - sale)) as sale,IF(type='B',"구매","대여") AS type FROM movie WHERE movie_no IN (SELECT movie_no FROM movie_actor WHERE actor_no = (SELECT actor_no FROM actor WHERE name = '마동석')) ORDER BY price LIMIT 0, 10;
SELECT movie_no, name, thumbnail, price, Floor(price / 100 * (100 - sale)) as sale,IF(type='B',"구매","대여") AS type FROM movie WHERE name LIKE '%해리 포터%' ORDER BY price desc LIMIT 0, 8;
